net.proteusframework.cms.controller

Class PluginContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.PageElementChain
      • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.PluginContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class PluginContext
extends PageElementChain
    Helper class for CMS information retrieval. This is only valid for a single HTTP request.

    Typical Usage:

     ParsedRequest prp = URLParser.parseRequest(url, requestMethod);
 if(prp.getRenderedElement() != null && prp.getError() == null)
 {
  PluginContext ctx = new PluginContext(prp, ...);
  try
  {
      ctx.activate();
      // Use Context
      // ....
      // Visit Children
      ctx.visit(new PluginVisitor(){....});
  }
  finally
  {
      ctx.deactivate();
  }
 }

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • getAncestorByType

        @Nullable
public <T extends PageElement> T getAncestorByType(Class<T> type)
        Get an ancestor in the path by type. It is expected this is called within visitation or from a component in the ParsedRequest.getPageElementChainPath() for a partial request.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type parameter.
        Parameters:
        type - the type.
        Returns:
        the ancestor or null if not found.
